Line5.125DE8: They have a house they’ve taken over, near the center of town. Hmm... You’ll never get in though, they guard it day and night.
VoiceDir1.125DE8: Afraid of the consequences of speaking, but unwilling to remain silent. Hoping the player can be trusted.
Line1.125DE8: Suna...yes, it happened last night. The Penitent ones arrested her on suspicion of heresy. They’ve been hunting for someone. Rounding people up for days to interrogate them.
